original_text: The man took me into the entrance room of the temple building. He measured the walls on each side of the entrance. They were 2½ metres thick. The entrance was 7 metres wide. The walls on each side of the entrance were 1½ metres wide.
korean_text: 그가 나를 데리고 성전 문 현관에 이르러 그 문의 좌우 벽을 측량하니 너비는 이쪽도 다섯 척이요 저쪽도 다섯 척이며 두께는 문 이쪽도 세 척이요 문 저쪽도 세 척이며

sentences.original_text: The man took me into the entrance room
He measured the walls on each side of the entrance
The walls on each side of the entrance were 1½ metres wide
